title: Apply light pink and purple color scheme across entire app

requirements.text: Update the global color scheme to use crisp white as the primary background color throughout the entire application
acceptanceCriteria: All pages and components use white as the default background color
Background color is consistent across all views

requirements.text: Update the color theme to use light pink as the primary accent color for UI elements including buttons, cards, borders, highlights, and interactive elements

quotes: light pinks, purples, and crisp white

acceptanceCriteria: Light pink is used as the dominant accent color throughout the UI
Buttons, cards, and interactive elements feature light pink styling
The color scheme is cohesive and appealing

requirements.text: Add purple as a secondary accent color to complement light pink, creating visual appeal and hierarchy in the UI

quotes: light pinks, purples, and crisp white

acceptanceCriteria: Purple is used strategically as a secondary accent color
Light pink and purple work together harmoniously
Purple adds visual interest without overwhelming the light pink theme

requirements.text: Update the Tailwind theme configuration in tailwind.config.js to define light pink and purple color variables that can be used consistently across components
acceptanceCriteria: Custom color variables for light pink and purple are defined in Tailwind config
Color tokens are reusable across the application

requirements.text: Update index.css theme variables to reflect the new light pink and purple color scheme, ensuring consistency with Tailwind configuration
acceptanceCriteria: CSS variables align with the new color scheme
Theme variables support the light pink and purple palette

requirements.text: Update all existing components to use the new light pink and purple color scheme, replacing current color references with the new theme tokens
acceptanceCriteria: All components render with the new color scheme
No remnants of the old color scheme remain visible
Visual consistency is maintained across all pages

constraints: Do not modify components in frontend/src/components/ui
Maintain existing functionality while updating visual styling
nonGoals: Changing layout or component structure beyond color updates
Modifying authentication or data flow logic
Adding hover or click color treatments for interactive elements
